parameters.name: Group ID
parameters.description: Group id from table creature_text. Random text will be said if multiple rows with the same group

parameters.name: Delay
parameters.description: Duration to wait before TEXT_OVER event is triggered

parameters.name: Faction Id
parameters.description: Use 0 to reset

name: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL

parameters.name: Creature
parameters.description: Use 0 for both to reset

parameters.name: Model id
parameters.description: Use 0 for both to reset

description: {target}: {pram1value:choose(0):{pram2value:choose(0):Demorph|Morph to model {pram2}}|{pram2value:choose(0):Morph to model from creature {pram1}|Invalid morph ({pram1}, {pram2}}}

name: SMART_ACTION_SOUND

parameters.name: Only to self
parameters.description: True - only target will hear the sound, false - everyone in visibility range will hear the sound

description: Play sound {pram1} to {pram2value:choose(0):every player in visibility range of {target}|{target}}

parameters.name: Emote ID
parameters.description: Emote id to play

parameters.name: Quest ID
parameters.description: Quest ID to mark as failed. Only for players

parameters.name: Quest ID
parameters.description: Add quest, only for players

parameters.name: Emote 1
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 2
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 3
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 4
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 5
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 6
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Spell
parameters.description: Spell id to cast

name: SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE

parameters.name: Creature
parameters.description: Creature Entry to summon

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: In ms

parameters.name: Storage ID
parameters.description: Target variable id to store summoned creature

description: Self: Summon creature {pram1} at {targetid:choose(8):{targetcoords}|{target}, moved by offset {targetcoords}}{pram5value:choose(0):| and attack {target}}

parameters.name: Increment
parameters.description: Modify threat of target by %

parameters.name: Decrement
parameters.description: Modify threat of target by %

name: SMART_ACTION_THREAT_ALL_PCT

parameters.name: Increment
parameters.description: Modify threat of all units in threat list by %

parameters.name: Decrement
parameters.description: Modify threat of all units in threat list by %

description: Self: {pram1value:choose(0):Decrement|Increment} threat of all units in threat list by {pram1value:choose(0):{pram2}|{pram1}}

parameters.name: Quest ID
parameters.description: Trigger quest group event. Also complete the quest

parameters.name: Phase ID
parameters.description: This is actual unit phase

1.name: UNIT_FLAG_SERVER_CONTROLLED
1.description: set only when unit movement is controlled by server - by SPLINE/MONSTER_MOVE packets, together with UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED; only set to units controlled by client; client function CGUnit_C::IsClientControlled returns false when set for owner

8.name: UNIT_FLAG_PVP_ATTACKABLE
8.description: allow apply pvp rules to attackable state in addition to faction dependent state

32.name: UNIT_FLAG_PREPARATION
32.description: don't take reagents for spells with SPELL_ATTR5_NO_REAGENT_WHILE_PREP

256.name: UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC
256.description: disables combat/assistance with PlayerCharacters (PC) - see Unit::_IsValidAttackTarget, Unit::_IsValidAssistTarget

512.name: UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC
512.description: disables combat/assistance with NonPlayerCharacters (NPC) - see Unit::_IsValidAttackTarget, Unit::_IsValidAssistTarget

1048576.name: UNIT_FLAG_TAXI_FLIGHT
1048576.description: disable casting at client side spell not allowed by taxi flight (mounted?), probably used with 0x4 flag

2097152.name: UNIT_FLAG_DISARMED
2097152.description: 3.0.3, disable melee spells casting..., "Required melee weapon" added to melee spells tooltip.

16777216.name: UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED
16777216.description: used in spell Eyes of the Beast for pet... let attack by controlled creature

parameters.name: Allow Attack State
parameters.description: 0 = stop attack, 1 = attack

parameters.name: Allow Combat Movement
parameters.description: 0 = stop combat based movement, 1 = enable combat movement

parameters.name: Phase
parameters.description: Note: This is Smart AI event phase, not actual creature phasemask

name: SMART_ACTION_INC_EVENT_PHASE
description: Self: Increment phase by {pram1} and decrement by {pram2}

parameters.name: With Emote
parameters.description: If set, creature will flee for assist with emote

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_GROUPEVENTHAPPENS
description: {target}: Call event happened from quest {pram1} for the whole group

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVEAURASFROMSPELL

parameters.name: Spell
parameters.description: Spell id to remove aura, if 0, all auras will be removed

description: {target}: {pram1value:choose(0):Remove all auras|Remove aura due to spell {pram1}}

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: 0 = default

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: 0 = default

0.name: Monster kill
0.description: Kill credit from parameter `credit` will be counted up

1.name: Event
1.description: has to be checked what it is

name: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE
description: Self: Set random event phase between: {pram1}, {pram2}, {pram3}, {pram4}, {pram5}, {pram6}

name: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE_RANGE

parameters.name: Phase Min
parameters.description: Minimum phase to random between (SAI phase)

parameters.name: Phase Max
parameters.description: Maximum phase to random between (SAI phase)

description: Self: Set random event phase between range {pram1} and {pram2}

name: SMART_ACTION_UPDATE_TEMPLATE
description: {target}: Update template as if it was creature {pram1}

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_IN_COMBAT_WITH_ZONE
description: Self: Set in combat with current zone

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_FOR_HELP
description: Self: Call for help within {pram1} yards

name: SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_GO

parameters.name: Despawn Time
parameters.description: In ms

description: {target}: Summon gameobject {pram1} at {targetid:choose(8):{targetcoords}|my position, moved by offset {targetcoords}} and despawn in {pram2} ms

parameters.name: Quest
parameters.description: Quest to complete when path ends (escort quest)

parameters.name: Despawn time
parameters.description: Despawn time after finishing the path

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: Miliseconds to wait before resuming path

name: SMART_ACTION_WP_STOP

parameters.name: Despawn Time
parameters.description: Time to wait before despawn

parameters.name: Quest
parameters.description: Quest id to mark as complete or failed

parameters.description: Quest will be marked as either completed or failed

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: If true, flight will be enabled

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: If true, swimming will be enabled

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_ORIENTATION
description: Self: {targetid:choose(1|8):Look at home position|Look at {targetcoords}|Look at {target}}

parameters.description: This timed event will be triggered

parameters.description: In miliseconds

parameters.name: Repeat Min
parameters.description: (only if it repeats)

parameters.name: Repeat Max
parameters.description: (only if it repeats)

description: Trigger timed event #{pram1} in {pram2} - {pram3} ms{pram4value:choose(0):| and then trigger every {pram4} - {pram5} ms}{pram6value:choose(0):| with {pram6} chance}

parameters.description: Entry from table creature_equip_template

parameters.description: Only if equipement id is 0

parameters.description: Only if equipement id is 0

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: Must be greater or equal than 1

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: overwrites already running actionlist?

parameters.name: Group ID
parameters.description: Makes target say its line from creature_text. If player, line from creature_text from this entry will be said. Doesn't trigger TEXT_OVER

parameters.name: Caster Target param 3
parameters.description: +the orignal target fields as Destination target; CasterTargets will cast spellID on all Targets (use with caution if targeting multiple * multiple units)

description: {target}: Call random timed action list between range {pram1} and {pram2}
